cards.name: Default Dances
cards.desc: A Dances to help start your deck. What a nice Lizard.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Mass} {$Dances} Gain 1 energy per turn, Unused Energy is lost between turns.

cards.name: Foil Default Dances
cards.desc: A Dances to help start your deck. What a nice Lizard. The rare foil lining is nice to look at!
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Mass} {$Dances} Gain 1 energy per turn, Unused Energy is lost between turns.

cards.name: Miner Dances
cards.desc: A Dances to help start your deck. Without magic or mana, The Dances rely on the 2nd most powerful resource, Gold.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Mass} {$Dances} Tap to gain 1 gold which is kept between turns.

cards.name: Foil Miner Dances
cards.desc: A Dances to help start your deck. Without magic or mana, The Dances rely on the 2nd most powerful resource, Gold. The rare foil lining is nice to look at!
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Mass} {$Dances} Tap to gain 1 gold which is kept between turns.

cards.name: Tiny Dances
cards.desc: A Dances to help start your deck, these cloned versions will help keep your workforce safe.
cards.rules: {$Dances} 2 build turns. Gives 1 attack per turn.

cards.name: Animus
cards.desc: A generator of Red Replicase, a biological resource for many creatures.
cards.rules: Provides 2 Red per turn. Unspent Red is lost between turns.

cards.name: Tiny Blood Drunk Miner Dances
cards.desc: A replicated miner ready to fight off monsters or other Dances.
cards.rules: {$Dances}Provides 1 gold and 1 attack per turn. May tap to spend 1 Red for another 1 attack.

cards.name: Drake Dances
cards.desc: Infused with the blood of a Drake, this Dances will protect you.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} {$Dances} Has 2 {$Stamina}, can tap for 1 attack.

cards.name: Husk
cards.desc: Spare biological material molded together to keep it fresh.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} {$Mass}

cards.name: Corpus
cards.desc: Spare biological material molded together to keep it fresh. The tumors on it grow and fall off.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} When put into play a Husk is immediatly added. Has 2 {$Stamina}, tap to pay 4 gold 1 red to add 3 husks

cards.name: Legion Miner
cards.desc: A miner that has been lost to a hivemind, whatever they were before is now lost, but the call for gold still rings true.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Mass} {$Unique} Gain 1 gold per turn, may be tapped paying 1 red to convert another Miner Dances into a Legion Miner.

cards.name: Cryokinesis Dances
cards.desc: A Dances genetically given the powers of ice.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} {$Dances} tap to give 2 {$Chill} to a target.

cards.name: Chilly Pepper Dances
cards.desc: A Dances genetically given the powers of ice, but will not survive after using it once.
cards.rules: {$Dances} 2 build turn. sacrifice to give 3 {$Chill} to a target.

cards.name: Insulated Dances
cards.desc: A Dances genetically given the powers of handling electricity, unfortunatly they cannot produce it themselves.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Dances} Tap to turn 1 energy into 1 attack.

cards.name: Chili Pepper Dances
cards.desc: A Dances genetically given the powers of capsaicin, but using it to attack terribly irritates their skin.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Dances} Tap to gain 1 attack, but will be {$Exhausted} for 2 turns.

cards.name: Felinid Dances
cards.desc: A Dances genetically turned into a cat/lizard hybrid, Those claws are sharp!
cards.rules: {$Dances} Gain 2 attack per turn.

cards.name: Tiny Dances' Everything Shrub
cards.desc: The one thing The Everything Tree can't reproduce is another Everything Tree, but the Tiny Dances will make do with a shrub version.
cards.rules: Gain 1 attack per active Tiny Dances on your side.

cards.name: Antima Comet
cards.desc: All the Dances greed and desire pulled a force unknown to crash upon the field.
cards.rules: {$Unique} 2 build turns. When finished building is immediatly sacrificed and deals 1 attack per every 4 {$Dances} on your opponent's side, rounded down.

cards.name: The Everything Tree
cards.desc: The fabled Everything Tree, the ruby apples it bears can mimic almost everything one wishes.
cards.rules: {$Unique} 2 build turns. When finished building is immediatly sacrificed and deals 1 attack for every 4 {$Dances} in play on your side, rounded down.

cards.name: Resonating Miner Dances
cards.desc: Advances in excavation tech allows faster digging, clearing an area has never been easier.
cards.rules: {$Dances} Gain 3 gold.

cards.name: Deep Diver Miner Dances
cards.desc: Deeper down are harsher environments,ancient creatures, but higher payout.
cards.rules: {$Dances} {$Frontline} {$Limit} Gain 2 gold.

cards.name: Geological radar station
cards.desc: A proper station to relay the surrounding caverns to teams of miners.
cards.rules: {$Unique}4 build turns. Gain 1 gold per Miner Dances on your side.

cards.name: Mobile Animus
cards.desc: For production of Replicase during battles.
cards.rules: Provides 1 red per turn, Unspent Red is lost between turns. May sacrifice with 3 gold to build a prompt Drake Dances.

cards.name: BEPIS Research
cards.desc: Spending some funds for research pays back.
cards.rules: Sacrificed next turn to gain 4 gold.

cards.name: Onsite Refinery
cards.desc: Moving and setting up machinery in contested lands is dangerous, but the output is worth it.
cards.rules: {$Unique} {$TdBlocker}tap to gain 4 gold.

cards.name: Ferritin Sac
cards.desc: Coagulating the blood and heat from a designed tumor gives enough to produce an ingot of blue Behemium.
cards.rules: 2 build turns, sacrifice to gain 1 gold and 1 blue.

cards.name: Nitrocybe
cards.desc: A mushroom that when popped releases poisonous spores.
cards.rules: 2 build turns, sacrifice to gain 1 attack.

cards.name: Unfinished Dances
cards.desc: A rushed clone rapidly falling apart.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Dances} 4{$Lifespan}, tap to gain 1 attack.

cards.name: Blood Pact
cards.desc: It is not uncommon that things you create want revenge.
cards.rules: Build 4 prompt husks and 1 unfinished Dances with a lifespan of 3 for opponent.

cards.name: Tyranno Dances
cards.desc: A mix of whale and T-rex should make the Dances more agile and dangerous.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$Dances} Gain 1 attack, may tap to pay 2 red for 1 attack.

cards.name: Tamed Goliath
cards.desc: After a show of power, the wild goliaths should fight alongside us.
cards.rules: Gain 2 attack per turn.

cards.name: Suspicious Tumor
cards.desc: Trying to copy the larger monster designs only yields a tumor that digs downwards and spits out ores.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} Gain 1 gold and 1 attack, may tap to pay 1 red for 1 gold.

cards.name: Gaussite Symbiote
cards.desc: A creature whose shell is pure Gaussite, and sheds its quite readily.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} Gain 1 attack and 1 green, may sacrifice with 3 green to construct 6 gauss charges.

cards.name: Conduit
cards.desc: Synthesizing Gaussite has its benefits. The material, while not too sturdy, stores easily.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} Gain 1 green, which is saved between turns.

cards.name: Thorium Dynamo
cards.desc: A construct with proper maintenance allows mining and processing of Gaussite.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} 4{$Limit} 2 build turns, Gain 5 gold and 1 green. May tap to pay 3 green for 3 gold.

cards.name: Barrier
cards.desc: A quick flash of force, enough to deflect an attack at a moments notice.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} {$Mass} 1{$Lifespan}

cards.name: Cryo Ray
cards.desc: The cheap wiring lowers how many times this can be shot, but thats what you get for the price.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} tap to pay 1 health to give 1 {$Chill} to a target.

cards.name: Gauss Charge
cards.desc: A fragmentary explosive, great to plant fields with.
cards.rules: {$Mass} Sacrificed next turn to gain 1 attack.

cards.name: Nivo Charge
cards.desc: A potent construct of cold air, although it can't sustain itself.
cards.rules: 1{$Lifespan} 10{$Limit} May sacrifice to add 5 {$Chill} to a target.

cards.name: Shelter Capsule
cards.desc: The immediate shelter is great to survive storms, but must be moved out of quickly right after.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} 1{$Lifespan}

cards.name: Mining Drill
cards.desc: Setting up a drill with a small team to run and replace the drill head yields a sizable profit.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} Gain 3 gold, may tap to pay 1 green for 1 gold.

cards.name: Fission Turret
cards.desc: The Gaussite while unstable in this state, is a wonderful application and refining method.
cards.rules: 5{$Lifespan} Gain 1 attack per turn, may sacrifice with 3 Energy for 3 green.

cards.name: Venge Cannon
cards.desc: A Dangerous Construct, the depleted Gaussite is use for other volitile designs.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} Gain 2 attack per turn, may tap to pay 2 hp and 4 Green to build 3 Gauss charges.

cards.name: Innervi Field
cards.desc: An improvement upon the Barrier, set up for quick FoB deployment.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} {$Prompt} {$TdBlocker} 3{$Lifespan} Start of turn regain 1 hp up to 5

cards.name: Iso Kronus
cards.desc: The heatsinks need some time to cool off after each shot.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} 2 build turns, Gain 2 attack then {$Exhausted} for 2 turns

cards.name: Kinetic Driver
cards.desc: Satellite offence, can pinpoint an enemy base and fall upon integral systems.
cards.rules: 6{$Lifespan} 4{$Limit} Gain 1 attack per turn, May sacrifice with 2 gold to destroy an enemy animus, blastforge or conduit.

cards.name: Cluster Bolt
cards.desc: While imprecise, spreading mines ready to use only deals minor casualties on our side.
cards.rules: 10{$Limit} Construct 4 gauss charges for next turn and 1 gauss charge for opponent

cards.name: Aegis
cards.desc: Much more reliable, but unable to be repaired limits its usability.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} {$Fragile} 10{$Limit}

cards.name: Gauss Cannon
cards.desc: Maintaining lots of these is troublesome, so is designed to run long enough for crew to evacuate.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} {$Mass} 10{$Limit} Gain 1 attack per turn.

cards.name: Gauss Fabricator
cards.desc: Mass production that eats up the resources of the surrounding area, when its sucked dry it's abandoned.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} {$Unique} 8{$Lifespan}, Constructs a Gauss cannon per turn.

cards.name: Asteri Cannon
cards.desc: Peak Engineering allowing bombardment and defense.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} 4{$Limit} Gain 3 attack may tap to pay 3 hp and construct a prompt barrier

cards.name: Tantalum Ray
cards.desc: Setting it to overdrive is harmful to the system, but more firepower is nice.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} Gain 1 attack, Tap to pay 3 hp and build a gauss charge.

cards.name: Mahar Rectifier
cards.desc: A self repairing design, but too much damage at once will destroy it.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} {$TdBlocker} Regains 2 hp per turn up to 5, may tap to give 2 attack.

cards.name: Ratvar
cards.desc: Old scraps rebooted, although not the full power it once had, it won't overpower us if it decides to.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} {$Fragile} {$Unique} Regains 4 hp up to 12, may tap to pay 7 hp to construct 5 gauss charges.

cards.name: Bluespace Artillery
cards.desc: Charged with enough materials, the land itself crumbles and ash remains.
cards.rules: {$Unique} {$Fragile} 6 build turns, Tap to pay 8 green and gain 8 gold and 8 attack.

cards.name: Photonic Fibroid
cards.desc: An attempt to produce self replicating explosives to create creeping areas to deny entry.
cards.rules: {$Prompt} {$TdBlocker} 10{$Limit},Next turn sacrifices self to give 2 attack.

cards.name: Concrete Golem
cards.desc: Rebar bones, stone-like skin, and a form of life forced inside of it.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Prompt} {$Fragile} Tap to gain 1 attack.

cards.name: Arrival Shuttle
cards.desc: Having the shuttle land on enemy forces makes it easier for Dances to get into the action.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} {$TdBlocker} 10{$Limit}, 3 {$Stamina} for 1 attack and 1 Default Dances per tap.

cards.name: Protoplasm
cards.desc: A blobish mass that engulfs the area in flames if allowed to combust.
cards.rules: {$Prompt} {$Fragile} {$TdBlocker} 10{$Limit} ,May sacrifice to gain 4 attack.

cards.name: Blastforge
cards.desc: Strong Behemium ingots are used in durable machinery plating, but must be formed quickly while fresh from the forge.
cards.rules: Gain 1 Blue, unused Blue is lost between turns.

cards.name: Chrono Filter
cards.desc: Destilling fresh Animus and Behemium from corpses is a lengthy process.
cards.rules: {$Unique} Gain 1 Blue and 1 Red then {$Exhausted} for 2 turns.

cards.name: Steelforge
cards.desc: Doubles the output along with the machinery to mold plating right after.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} Gain 2 Blue, may tap to pay 1 Gold and 2 Blue to convert a Miner Dances into a Steelsplitter.

cards.name: Centrifuge
cards.desc: Collecting Ruby Apple shards and inserting it into this machine extracts more than possible, although just elements.
cards.rules: {$Unique} 3 build turns, when finished building sacrifice and gain 3 Gold and 2 of every color resource.

cards.name: Synthesizer
cards.desc: The hardy plating allows faster gain of Gaussite, Along with a port to synth back Behemium.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} Gain 2 Green, may tap to pay 3 Green to gain 2 Blue.

cards.name: Auride Core
cards.desc: Using muscle, one may turn a profit.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} Tap to pay 1 attack to gain 2 Gold.

cards.name: Pixie
cards.desc: Grenades with a whimsical name to hide their true intentions.
cards.rules: {$Mass} Sacrifice to gain 1 attack.

cards.name: Thermite Core
cards.desc: Volitile mixtures prepared for later use.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} 5{$Lifespan}, Tap to pay 2 attack for 2 pixies.

cards.name: Manticore
cards.desc: A mech when not in use for battle may help clear land.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} Gain 2 attack may tap to pay 2 attack to gain 3 gold.

cards.name: Oxide Mixer
cards.desc: A source of Pixies, but the gas mixture eventually runs out.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} 4{$Lifespan} Constructs a Pixie per turn.

cards.name: Nuclear Operative
cards.desc: Mercenary worker that targets the weak.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$TdBlocker}, 3{$Stamina} tap to remove a non-blocking Miner Dances.

cards.name: Flame Animus
cards.desc: The heat deters others from approaching.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} 2 build turns, gain 1 Attack and 1 Red. 1 attack.

cards.name: Infusion Grid
cards.desc: The heat and protection of the plating allows some minor Animus growth, but too fragmented to produce anything complex.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} Sacrifice with 1 Red to build 4 prompt Husks.

cards.name: Shredder
cards.desc: Mechanical claws that slice through armies, but without any ranged weaponry can be picked off.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Frontline} Tap to gain 1 attack.

cards.name: Wall
cards.desc: A simple application of Behemium, many foward bases can be easily set up.
cards.rules: {$Prompt} {$TdBlocker}.

cards.name: Ebb Turbine
cards.desc: Sending a fresh worker gives a boost in productivity.
cards.rules: Gain 2 gold, may tap to sacrifice a Miner Dances and gain 3 gold and 1 Energy.

cards.name: Lancetooth
cards.desc: More muscle will help set up the main structure.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} 2 build turns, tap to gain 2 Attack.

cards.name: Militia
cards.desc: When not needed will glady work a side job.
cards.rules: Gain 1 Attack, tap to pay 1 attack for 1 gold.

cards.name: Steelsplitter
cards.desc: Strong mechanical bodies that are easily manufactured.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} {$Mass} Tap to gain 1 Attack.

cards.name: Doomed Wall
cards.desc: Stretching the material thin covers a wider area, but will collapse under its own weight.
cards.rules: {$Prompt} {$TdBlocker} 3{$Lifespan}.

cards.name: Energy Matrix
cards.desc: Instead of trying to make the most of a single ingot, getting a 2nd one provides a better stability.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$Prompt} {$TdBlocker}.

cards.name: Doomed Mech
cards.desc: Stuck on overdrive, the entire thing will burst into flames after prolonged use.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} 5{$Lifespan}, Tap to gain 2 Attack.

cards.name: Polywall
cards.desc: A structure that seems to focus its mass against the point of impact, but can be exploited if multiple blows are dealt at the same time.
cards.rules: {$Prompt} {$TdBlocker} {$Frontline}.

cards.name: Duel Turret
cards.desc: An attachment for blastforges by using the escaping heat to power itself.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} Gain 2 attack, may tap to sacrifice a Blastforge for 2 Attack.

cards.name: Apollo
cards.desc: Recon and attack, This mech will snipe any unwary target.
cards.rules: 2 build turns, Tap to destroy any unit with 3 or less hp.

cards.name: Omega Splitter
cards.desc: Heavy in resources and weight, this mech is not to be messed with.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$TdBlocker} Tap to gain 3 Attack.

cards.name: Defense Grid
cards.desc: A system to rapidly grow claimed land, more Miners will safely work in the deep territory.
cards.rules: {$Unique} {$TdBlocker} 7{$Lifespan}, Gain a Miner Dances per turn.

cards.name: Odin
cards.desc: Blasts Steelsplitters out a mass driver into the thick of battle, enemy forces won't see it coming.
cards.rules: {$Unique} {$TdBlocker} When placed Construct 3 Steelsplitters, Sacrifice a steelsplitter to gain 4 attack.

cards.name: E-N
cards.desc: A robo doggy that encourages all the Dances.
cards.rules: 10{$Limit} When placed add a Default Dances, Gain 1 Attack per turn.

cards.name: Armored Slaughter Demon
cards.desc: After an offering and the promise of fresh bodies, this terrible beast slips through.
cards.rules: {$Unique} {$Prompt} {$TdBlocker} Tap to gain 4 Attack.

cards.name: Iceblade Golem
cards.desc: Permafrost molded into a humanoid form, Its stare chills the hearts of its targets.
cards.rules: {$Frontline} Gain 1 Attack per turn. Tap to add 2 {$Chill} to a target.

cards.name: Bombarder
cards.desc: Sleek and clean, the death machine.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker}, 2{$Stamina} Tap to gain 3 Attack.

cards.name: Cauterizer
cards.desc: A proper insulated machine instead of using genetics.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$TdBlocker} When placed gain 4 Default Dances, Tap to pay 4 Energy for 2 Attack.

cards.name: Wendigo
cards.desc: Found while mining a frozen area, the cage and meat to sate it before battles keep it calm enough.
cards.rules: {$Unique} Gain 3 Attack per turn, may tap to pay 1 Attack to give 7 {$Chill} to a target.

cards.name: Urban Sentry
cards.desc: A robot sent to quell riots.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} Gain 1 attack per turn.

cards.name: Xeno Guardian
cards.desc: Designed to hold against intruding monsters before reinforcement arrives.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} Gain 1 attack per turn.

cards.name: Borehole Patroller
cards.desc: The many tunnels dug from mining normally are great ambush spots.
cards.rules: {$TdBlocker} When placed construct a Pixie, Gain 1 Attack per turn.

cards.name: Chieftan
cards.desc: Compact tank designed to be abandoned after its fuel runs out.
cards.rules: {$Fragile} {$TdBlocker} 3{$Lifespan}, Tap to gain 2 Attack.

cards.name: Redeemer
cards.desc: Its magnetic properties pulls our own minefields towards us.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$TdBlocker} When placed Construct 6 Gauss charges with 3 build turns for your opponent, tap to gain 3 Attack.

cards.name: Tesla Coil
cards.desc: Setting it up is dangerous, but it denies the area easily.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$Fragile} When placed Gain 2 Default Dances, Tap to sacrifice a Default Dances to gain 3 Attack.

cards.name: Plasmafier
cards.desc: The surrounding area turns to liquid plasma after use.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$Fragile} {$TdBlocker} Tap to sacrifice 1 Miner Dances to Gain 4 Attack.

cards.name: Thunderhead
cards.desc: Forces beyond understanding that muddles the mind.
cards.rules: {$Unique} {$Frontline} {$TdBlocker} 3{$Lifespan} Gain 4 Attack per turn.

cards.name: Arms Race
cards.desc: Rushing to dominate the battlefield.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} Spell: construct a Tarsier with 2 build turns, construct a Gauss Cannon, construct a Steelsplitter, and construct 4 Default Dances for your opponent.

cards.name: The Wincer
cards.desc: Large enough to remove bits of planet.
cards.rules: {$Unique} {$Fragile} 3 build turns, tap to sacrifice 5 Miner Dances to gain 15 Attack be {$Exhausted} for 3 turns.

cards.name: Valkyrion
cards.desc: Its attacks are so potent, residue Gaussite activate on its targets.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$TdBlocker} Tap to gain 4 Attack and construct 2 barriers on your opponent's coming turn.

cards.name: Colossus
cards.desc: We avoid this, but mess with enemy signals so they run into it instead.
cards.rules: 4{$Limit} {$Fragile} {$TdBlocker} Tap to gain 3 Attack.

cards.name: Centurion
cards.desc: Using all the engineering prowess we know, we can utilize our resources to produce this.
cards.rules: {$Unique} {$Prompt} {$TdBlocker} Gain 2 Attack per turn.
